marklogic.body: Kojima is smart, sensible, and has a great talent for storytelling, but above all, he's an innovator. The most amazing, clever, out-there ideas won't do you any good unless you've got the balls to make those ideas a reality, regardless of what the conventions are. Kojima took some real risks, and they paid Off big time, even though they might just as easily have crashed and Burned. I admire him for that.
